org.hswgt.teachingbox.core.rl.experiment

Class NumberOfDifferenceNetworkNodesAverager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hswgt.teachingbox.core.rl.experiment.DataAverager<Double,Double>
      • org.hswgt.teachingbox.core.rl.experiment.ScalarAverager
        • org.hswgt.teachingbox.core.rl.experiment.NumberOfDifferenceNetworkNodesAverager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, ExperimentObserver, FeatureFunctionObserver, Plotter

    public class NumberOfDifferenceNetworkNodesAverager
extends ScalarAverager
implements FeatureFunctionObserver
    Averages the number of network nodes added/deleted per step.
    See Also:
